translation.en: Yes, yes, yes.
The Golden Eaglets won against Germany with a 2-0 victory!
Yes! Yes! Yes!
My people, I said you don't know the value of money.
Good morning.
-My people-- -Welcome, my good child. Welcome!
-"A" for apple. -[kids] "A" for apple.
-"B" for ball. -[kids] "B" for ball.
-"C" for cup. -[kids] "C" for cup.
Including this one. Put them together.
The ones on the floor?
Pull it well, pull it.
Dust it off well.
Can you see this one? Shake off all the dust off it.
Then fold it.
-Mommy. -Fold it and align the edges.
Ah! Tolani!
What is wrong? Tell me.
-My darling, what is wrong? -[sniffles]
Eh? What is wrong with you?
You're not talking? Come on.
Ah. You didn't tell me you were coming.
You used to write me letters, I collected them.
translation.ko: 전에는 편지도 잘 쓰더니 내가 다 모아 뒀지

translation.en: -Mother, it's not my fault. -All this time, nothing? That's not nice.
translation.ko: - 엄마, 내 탓 아니에요 - 이렇게 오래 안 쓰다니

translation.en: You didn't even consider that I'd be missing you. Eh?
translation.ko: 내가 그리워할 거라고 생각도 안 했지?

translation.en: Tolani, come here, my dear.
Look at how frail you are. What has--
Let me get you water.
Let me get you water.
My darling.
Take it.
Well done. Eh!
Look at how thin you are! What is wrong?
translation.ko: 마른 것 좀 봐! 무슨 일이니?

translation.en: Haven't you been eating?
Is it that you lack food? Or is it money?
My God.
Tolani, look me in the eyes.
What is wrong with you? Why are you so thin?
What is wrong?
Mommy.
-I have suffered. -Ah!
My God.
I have been through so much.
How much for your banana?
Isn't it five kobo?
No, it's too expensive.
So, have you decided what you want to do about Sanwo?
Not yet.
How long have you been in the relationship?
Three years.
Don't ask for my advice if you won't take it.
translation.ko: 안 들을 거면 조언을 구하지도 마 내가 사귀는 남자가

translation.en: If I'm dating a man,
and in six months he hasn't proposed, hasn't done anything, I'm gonna date other people.
translation.ko: 6개월 안에 프러포즈 안 하면 난 다른 사람 만날 거야

translation.en: -[scoffs] -You can still take me out to parties, to the club every Friday, and buy me beer.
translation.ko: 매주 금요일에 파티나 클럽에 초대해서 술은 사 줘도 되는데

translation.en: But you better not wake up Saturday morning and ask me for breakfast.
translation.ko: 토요일 아침에 아침 식사를 요구하는 건 안 된다고

translation.en: Six months, maximum.
"War Against Indiscipline."
This is meant to introduce sanity into our lifestyle.
You will be jailed if you throw litter out of a bus.
translation.ko: 버스 창 밖으로 흙을 던지면 감옥에 가는 거야

translation.en: [Tolani, in English] I was never alone in Lagos.
Not even when I wanted to be.
I always had people around me.
Far too many.
My roommate Rose was someone I could ask for advice.
translation.ko: 내 룸메이트 로즈는 조언을 구할 만한 사람이었어

translation.en: She spoke her mind.
Whether or not I was ready to listen.
translation.ko: 내가 들을 준비가 안 됐더라도 말이야

translation.en: [Tolani] Though we were in separate departments.
I was in loans.
She was our branch manager's personal secretary.
-And she couldn't stand him. -Yes?
Alhaji!
I had no problems with my manager.
translation.ko: 난 내 상사와 아무 문제도 없었어 "알하지 우마 아부바카"

translation.en: Here's the file, sir. Put it in my office.
Okay, sir.
[Tolani] Most days, I didn't see Rose until lunchtime anyway.
translation.ko: 어차피 점심시간이 되어서야 로즈를 만날 수 있었지

translation.en: We would join the line to buy food with other clerks.
translation.ko: 다른 직원들과 식당 줄에 서곤 했어

translation.en: Like Godwin, a born-again Christian who worked in my department.
[Tolani] And Franca, the office gossip.
Ignatius was the most senior clerk and we all respected him.
He was in charge of maintaining personnel files.
Hakeem, a bad-tempered man from customer service.
translation.ko: 성질 급한 하킴은 고객 서비스 부서에서 일했어

translation.en: [singing] ♪ Is it when my water finish? ♪
Oh, Nepa!
[Tolani] I had other tenants who I could turn to, older women who were more mature.
translation.ko: 기댈 수 있는 주민들이 있었지 더 성숙한 연장자들 말이야

translation.en: [woman] It's okay.
It's okay now.
[Tolani] There was Mama Chidi,
who had three young children and was heavily pregnant with another.
translation.ko: 어린아이 셋을 키우면서 또 임신 중이었지

translation.en: Mama, the beans are burning.
She loved reading so much that she would've been a professor in an ideal world.
translation.ko: 독서를 너무 좋아해서 교수였다면 딱 맞았을 거야

translation.en: Reduce it.
[Tolani] There was Mrs. Durojaye,
but she was usually at work.
And the way she disciplined her sons didn't encourage me to approach her.
translation.ko: 그리고 아들들 훈육 방법을 보면 다가가기 꺼려졌어

translation.en: You want to be a useless child? You want to kill me?
translation.ko: 이 쓸모 없는 녀석! 엄마를 죽일 셈이야?

translation.en: Do you want to kill me? Ah!
I talk and you ignore me.
translation.ko: 너한테 말하고 있는데 지금 나 무시하냐?

translation.en: Try it next time and see what happens. You'll deal with me!
translation.ko: 또 이러면 어떻게 되나 봐! 이쪽으로 와!

translation.en: Go and kneel down over there.
What is the problem? Did I make a mistake giving birth to you?
translation.ko: 대체 뭐가 문제냐? 어? 널 낳은 게 실수였어!

translation.en: Your useless father has gambled all his money! I'm the only one working!
translation.ko: 쓸모없는 네 아빠는 도박으로 돈을 날리고 나만 일하잖아!

translation.en: I work morning, afternoon, night and you won't let me have any peace!
translation.ko: 아침, 점심, 저녁으로 일해! 너희 때문에 못 살겠다!

translation.en: Ayo, can you see your older siblings?
Don't behave like them!
Don't become like them at all. What is it?
Why do I have to yell every day? Are we the only ones who live here?
translation.ko: 맨날 소리 지르게 하고 말이야 여기 우리만 사냐?

translation.en: -Is this your friend? -My friend Tolani.
Hi Tolani!
-Hi! -Tolani meet…
-What do you want to drink? -Beer.
[Tolani] Sanwo, food is ready.
[Sanwo] Mmm. Thank you.
Who shaved your mustache?
You like it, right? It's my new style.
Your barber must not like you.
Her, concerning the matter of… my dowry.
translation.ko: 그래, 아까 하던 얘기 말이야 내 신붓값

translation.en: What about it?
It's been three years since we started dating.
Just last year, you told me to give you some more time.
translation.ko: 작년에 당신한테 더 시간을 주겠다고 했지만

translation.en: But, when exactly are you planning to meet my family
so we can make this official?
Let's do the proper thing so you can pay my dowry.
translation.ko: 제대로 해야 하잖아 내 신붓값도 치르고

translation.en: I don't understand why it's taking so long. What's wrong?
translation.ko: 대체 왜 이렇게 오래 끌어? 문제가 뭐야?

translation.en: I just don't want to end up one of those women who are disappointed by a man.
translation.ko: 맨날 울기만 하는 차인 여자가 되기 싫을 뿐이야

translation.en: Why this talk now?
I'm just telling you this because time is running out.
translation.ko: 그냥 내 생각을 말하는 거야 시간이 없으니까

translation.en: For who?
All right.
Where would we live?
[scoffs] We will live together like every married couple.
Do you know how much rent is in this town?
Don't I live in the same Lagos as you, hustling every day?
translation.ko: 아니, 내가 사는 라고스와 다른 동네니까 매일 일에 치어 사는데도 오쇼그보에 못 살잖아

translation.en: Do I live in Oshogbo?
translation.ko: 매일 일에 치어 사는데도 오쇼그보에 못 살잖아

translation.en: Uh… even Rose, she said I should give you six months maximum.
And if you're not ready, maybe I should break up with you.
-You better not listen to her. -Hmm.
She's just jealous.
-Jealous of what? -Uh.
She sees that you're in a steady relationship and she can't take it.
translation.ko: 굳건한 관계를 유지하는 게 보기 싫은 거겠지

translation.en: She has never liked me from the very start.
Somebody that can't keep a man, that's who gives you advice?
translation.ko: 관계 유지도 못하는 사람한테 무슨 조언을 받아?

translation.en: All right.
What about your uncle?
The one that sends you on errands, then gives you little or no money afterward.
translation.ko: 심부름시키고 쥐꼬리만 한 돈 쥐여 주는 삼촌 말이야

translation.en: But when he wants to go to England and America,
translation.ko: 그러면서 자기는 영국이나 미국에 가고 싶을 때

translation.en: he will get on a first class plane.
When he wants to travel within Nigeria, he will call you,
translation.ko: 나이지리아 안에서 여행할 땐 당신을 부르지

translation.en: "Sanwo, let's go." Why is that? Why?
Go and ask him.
-I should go and ask him? -Mm.
Is that someone that wishes you well?
Look, Tolani. Leave my uncle out of this. You hear?
-I'm sure it's because of his wife. -Mm.
Sure, she's to blame. That's true.
-She's the one. -Mm.
I'm not even here to discuss that either.
translation.ko: 그 얘기 하러 온 것도 아니야

translation.en: The discussion is two ways now, hmm?
You've said your speech, let me say my own.
translation.ko: 네 얘기를 했으니 이제 내 차례야

translation.en: Talk.
I'm listening.
Tolani.
I know you're getting frustrated.
-I'm working on a new deal. -Ha.
-This one is different. -I said I don't want to hear it. Ah.
translation.ko: - 이번 건 달라 - 듣기 싫다고 했잖아

translation.en: That's fine then.
Are you upset?
All right, what deal?
-All you have to know is it's risk-free. -Mm..
Tolani, I won't disappoint you. I'm not a bastard.
translation.ko: 톨라니, 실망시키지 않을게 난 못된 놈이 아니야

translation.en: -I'd like to believe so. -I'm just playing with you.
translation.ko: - 나중에 그대로 말해 줄게 - 그냥 농담하는 거야

translation.en: -Come here. -Leave me alone.
-My sister. -Uncle.
Have you heard?
-Salako sacked Rose. -What! Why?
She slapped him.
It was from Franca I heard it.
-When? -Thirty minutes ago.
But you know what? I will confirm it once I discuss her case with my madam.
translation.ko: 아무튼, 상사랑 면담 후에 제대로 확인해 볼게

translation.en: How come Franca was the first to hear?
Ah, I don't know, but you know that all bad news comes from that woman's mouth.
translation.ko: 글쎄, 모든 나쁜 소식은 그 여자 입에서 나오잖아

translation.en: She must be lying.
Well, she swears that she saw them with her two naked eyes.
So where is Rose now?
She left.
I only came to tell you because you're her friend.
translation.ko: 로즈 친구니까 말해 주러 온 거뿐이야

translation.en: Thank you.
Had I been around, she wouldn't have done it.
translation.ko: 내가 곁에 있었다면 그러지 않았을 텐데

translation.en: How?
I would have calmed her down.
It was about time. Rose does not know how to control herself.
translation.ko: 그럴 때도 됐죠, 로즈는 자기 조절이 안 되잖아요

translation.en: How?
And Salako has been letting her get away with it?
-That's it. -How?
We should pray for her.
Pray for who? Everybody knows she's Salako's girlfriend.
translation.ko: 왜? 로즈가 살라코의 여자 친구인 거 모두 아는데

translation.en: -Ah, is that new? -[clears throat]
Ah, Tolani, how are you?
-Have you heard? -Heard what?
Don't bear false witness.
Face your food, pastor. Who is talking to you?
translation.ko: 밥이나 먹어, 목사님 누가 너한테 얘기한대?

translation.en: It's Rose's concern and no one else's. [tsk]
Just be talking anyhow.
Me, I like her, I'm just concerned.
Who else was there apart from Ignatius?
Um, Godwin. But he was all right.
Hakeem too was trying to open his mouth, but Franca was the actual devil.
translation.ko: 하킴도 말하려고 했는데 진짜 나쁜 건 프랑카야

translation.en: She was lucky I wasn't there to deal with her.
translation.ko: 내 눈 앞에서 안 그런 게 천만다행이지

translation.en: It's her type that sleeps with useless men like Salako.
translation.ko: 그런 여자가 살라코처럼 쓸모없는 남자랑 자곤 하지

translation.en: Why did he sack you?
Because he is a bastard.
It won't end well for him, the stress he put me through at that bank.
translation.ko: 은행에서 나한테 한 짓 때문에 그 인생 망할 거야

translation.en: He touched me up and down.
Did you slap him?
Why does it matter?
Why now Rose? Why?
Tolani, because women like me and you never get justice in this country.
translation.ko: 톨라니, 나랑 너 같은 여자는 이 나라에서 대우를 못 받잖아

translation.en: Only criminals get justice.
Look at him. Can't you see how corrupt he is?
translation.ko: 그 남자 사는 거 못 봤어? 얼마나 부패했는데

translation.en: He steals from the bank, steals from the customers and still collects bribes.
translation.ko: 은행 돈과 고객 돈을 횡령하고 뇌물까지 받는다니까

translation.en: Him and that snake Umar.
[sucks teeth] Forget that one.
Umar is a part of it, he's a part too!.
Those bad debt letters you've been typing, you think they'll be repaid?
translation.ko: 네가 타이핑한 악성 채무 편지 그 돈 받을 거 같아?

translation.en: Salako opens an account for a big man
translation.ko: 살라코는 부자를 위해 계좌를 열어 주고

translation.en: and Umar gives the big man a loan.
translation.ko: 살라코는 부자를 위해 계좌를 열어 주고 우마는 그 부자한테 대출해 줘

translation.en: -Hmm. -Big man then gives them both a cut.
translation.ko: 우마는 그 부자한테 대출해 줘 그 부자는 그 둘에게 한 몫씩 챙겨 주고

translation.en: But the three of them know the loan will never be repaid.
translation.ko: 하지만 그 셋은 알지 그 대출금은 갚지 않을 것을

translation.en: What you think happens with those dormant accounts?
translation.ko: 그 휴면 계좌들은 어떻게 될 거 같아?

translation.en: Salako is using them as his personal accounts.
It's why he's early every morning.
translation.ko: 왜 그렇게 아침 일찍 출근하는 거 같아?

translation.en: So he can steal from them.
The government ministers steal, even the president steals.
Then you toil and work hard,
translation.ko: 그러면 우린 피땀 흘리며 더 열심히 일하지만

translation.en: but still can't afford to buy meat to put in your lunch in the afternoon.
translation.ko: 그러면 우린 피땀 흘리며 더 열심히 일하지만 여전히 점심으로 먹을 고기도 못 살 형편이지

translation.en: If I ever see that man again, I will deal with him.
translation.ko: 다시 보게 된다면 혼쭐 내 줄 거야

translation.en: Please my sister, just take it easy.
My work of seven years. Seven years.
Show me one person that can type faster in that bank.
translation.ko: 그 은행에서 나보다 더 타자가 빠른 사람은 없어

translation.en: Show me one person whose shorthand is better than mine. Show me!
translation.ko: 나보다 속기가 빠른 사람은 없다고, 진짜야!

translation.en: So what are you going to do now?
Don't worry. I'll take care of myself.
Our rent is due.
I'll talk to Vali-- Violet.
Violet? Are you sure?
Yes, if I can't ask her for money, who else can I ask?
translation.ko: 그래, 언니 말고 누구한테 돈을 빌리겠어?

translation.en: Ah. Okay.
Have you eaten?
I don't feel like eating.
-[speaking Italian] Come stai? -[speaking Italian] Va bene.
Bellissima.
Oh, grazie, you speak Italiano?
Ah, I stayed in Italy.
You know, when I was in Italy, I went to their "Vasasi" store.
translation.ko: 이탈리아에 있을 때 '바사시' 가게에 가곤 했죠

translation.en: -Versace. -Ah.
Ah! Mamma mia, very good fashion.
Ah, I'm telling you, I stayed in Italy.
All right.
Yes.
-[laughing] -Morning.
Aunty.
Morning sister Vio.
Good morning. Rose. Why are you here?
I need to talk to you.
Go wait for me.
Go wait for me now.
-Hi there. -Hey, aunty.
-I'll be back soon, hmm? Pronto. -[chuckles]
Mabel!
You see this one? Hmm? Just this one.
-Yes. -You finish loosening it.
-Okay, ma. -I'll be right back.
-Pronto. -No problem.
Rose, what is it?
I want to borrow some money.
-I don't have money. -How?
I don't have money.
Why didn't you ask Tolani?
Why would I ask her? Is she my relative?
Anyway, I don't have money.
I've come all this way!
-You should've called. -What phone am I going to use?
translation.ko: - 미리 전화하지 그랬니? - 무슨 전화로 전화해?

translation.en: -Aren't there call centers in your area? -There are no working lines in my area.
translation.ko: 너희 동네에 전화 센터 없어? 우리 동네에 되는 전화는 한 대도 없어

translation.en: Rose, I don't have money.
I don't have. Can you hear me?
The last time I borrowed you money, it took you a long time to return my money.
Therefore, I don't have money to give you.
But Fedele sends you money every month.
translation.ko: 하지만 페델레가 매달 돈을 보내 주잖아

translation.en: For his daughter.
In foreign currency?
See, we are talking of lira. Lira is not that strong.
translation.ko: 리라로 보내 주잖아 리라 환율은 별로야

translation.en: It's not like we are talking about dollars or pounds sterling.
But you have money to live in Keffi and to rent a shop in Onikan?
translation.ko: 하지만 케피에 살고 오니칸에 가게 빌릴 돈은 있잖아

translation.en: Will you behave yourself?
I don't have time for this nonsense.
What is the matter with you? I don't have money to lend you.
translation.ko: 대체 왜 그러니? 너한테 줄 돈 없다고 했잖아

translation.en: The only thing I can do is,
give you a little bit, you know, something to get you by.
translation.ko: 버틸 수 있을 정도의 돈을 주는 것뿐이야

translation.en: Sisi said we should help each other. That's what she said.
translation.ko: 엄마가 우린 서로 도와야 한다고 했잖아

translation.en: Sisi can say whatever she likes!
-Really! -Yes! What? It's the truth.
Ah-ah. Sisi can say whatever she wants.
translation.ko: - 진짜? - 그래! 뭐? 그게 사실이야 엄마가 뭐라고 하든 상관없어

translation.en: That's small town talk. Let me tell you.
Sisi had so many children. In fact, too many and she can't afford them.
translation.ko: 엄마는 애를 너무 많이 낳았어 감당 못 할 정도로

translation.en: If it wasn't for my father, I wouldn't have gone to Italy.
translation.ko: 우리 아빠가 아니었다면 난 이탈리아에 못 갔을 거야

translation.en: I wouldn't have met Fedele. I wouldn't have had my child.
translation.ko: 페델레도 못 만나고 아이도 못 낳았겠지

translation.en: In fact, I wouldn't be sitting here today.
translation.ko: 사실, 여기까지 온 것도 아빠 덕분이야

translation.en: Vio, you'll never see me insulting Sisi.
translation.ko: 나는 절대 엄마를 이렇게 모욕하지 않아

translation.en: My dad paid for my secretarial studies, if you don't know.
translation.ko: 그리고 우리 아빠가 내 서기 자격증 비용을 댔고 몰랐다면 알아 둬

translation.en: I know. That's the only thing he could help her with.
translation.ko: 알아, 너희 아빠가 도운 건 그거 하나뿐이야

translation.en: Don't insult my father, don't try it. Don't even go there.
translation.ko: 우리 아빠 모욕하지 마 시작도 하지 마

translation.en: -My father was a generous man. -Hm.
Generous indeed.
The only thing is that his salary as a teacher
didn't afford him any luxuries. Just the little things--
translation.ko: 사치를 누릴 수 없었지 그냥 사소한 것만…

translation.en: Ah, Violet you have-- you have a bad mouth!
You talk nonsense.
-What about yours? -Sisi said it! You have a bad mouth.
translation.ko: - 너는 어떻고? - 엄마도 언니 입 험하댔잖아

translation.en: And yours isn't uncouth? Look at you, hypocrite. Am I your senior?
translation.ko: 넌 안 험하고? 이 위선자야 내가 네 또래로 보이니?

translation.en: Don't be rude to me. But really, weren't we brought up together?
translation.ko: 무례하게 굴지 마 우리 같이 자랐잖아?

translation.en: Tell me, were we not raised the same way?
translation.ko: 같은 교육을 받고 자란 거 아니었니?

translation.en: Didn't we drink garri and water together?
Hmm? Rose, I don't have money. Am I clear?
translation.ko: 안 그래? 로즈, 나 돈 없어, 알겠어?

translation.en: Oh, so now you've become a big woman in Lagos.
No problem. Everybody has their time.
I don't have money.
Chukwuebuka! [kid] Ma!
Bring what I asked you to bring for me.
♪ If you want to marry a woman ♪
-Mama Chidi. -Please go and bring the second one.
translation.ko: - 엄마 - 가서 두 번째 거 가져와

translation.en: [chuckles] Mrs. Durojaye.
-How are you? -I'm fine, welcome.
I admire your car. It takes you out and brings you back.
translation.ko: 외출할 때 타는 차가 당신 차야?

translation.en: It really helps. Mama Chidi, to have a car really helps.
translation.ko: 정말 도움이 되지, 치디 엄마 차는 정말 도움이 돼

translation.en: Hey, I can't forget when the last one finally broke down.
translation.ko: 마지막 차가 드디어 망가졌을 때를 잊을 수 없어

translation.en: Ah! Mama Chidi, I struggled.
But we thank God. We thank God.
My sister, maybe one day Papa Chidi too will be able to buy one.
translation.ko: 어쩌면 언젠가 치디 아빠도 한 대 살 지도 몰라

translation.en: What are you thinking? It's fairly used.
translation.ko: 어떤 차 원하는데? 내 거 깨끗이 잘 탔어

translation.en: -Really? -Yes. Imported.
My sister, I'll be happy with any one,
whether it's used or an imported car.
As long as it's from overseas, it's okay.
But see, you will have to wait till after twelve noon
on sanitation day before you go out.
And if you must get a number plate license,
it has to be the type of mine, an odd number.
translation.ko: 내 거 같은 거로 해, 홀수로

translation.en: So that you can at least go out three times in a week.
Even me during weekdays, I wake up very, very early.
As early as 5:00 a.m. to go out.
Because anything after 7:00, that's another problem.
translation.ko: 오전 7시 이후에는 또 다른 문제가 있거든

translation.en: That is a good thing.
-Ah-ah. Rose. Welcome. How are you? -Mama Chidi.
I'm fine, how are your children?
We thank God. We're planning to cook beans today.
translation.ko: 다행히 잘 지내 오늘 콩 요리를 하려고 해

translation.en: How is Papa Chidi?
He's fine, thanks to God. Welcome, eh.
Well done.
Rubbish.
An extremely useless individual.
Worthless and no use to anyone.
-Okay, Mama Chidi. -Hm? I'm going inside.
Let me go and remove my drawers, I'm sweating.
translation.ko: 가서 바지 좀 벗어야겠어 땀이 나네

translation.en: Okay.
Chukwuebuka!
What a pity.
Not at all, Vio is wicked. Sisi told me already.
She said if Vio saw her injured on the road,
she'd leave her to die.
At least she should send money to your mother now.
translation.ko: 그래도 언니가 엄마한테 돈은 보내야 하지 않을까?

translation.en: What? What are you saying?
Sisi has never gotten even one single kobo from Vio since she came back from Italy.
translation.ko: 언니는 이탈리아에서 돌아온 후 엄마한테 땡전 한 푼 안 줬어

translation.en: For real?
Not even one!
She only knows how to shout "mamma mia," when she has customers.
Violet.
She doesn't want anyone to know we're sisters.
She doesn't understand any Italian! She doesn't, she's just pretending.
translation.ko: 이탈리아어도 못 해! 모르면서 아는 척하는 거야

translation.en: And she met Fedele when she was cleaning his house!
Please, I'm starting to have a headache.
This world… I'm thinking maybe I should even be grateful.
translation.ko: 이 세상은 정말… 이것도 감사해야 하나?

translation.en: That Mrs., uh…
Durojaye…
Whatever she calls herself. Her.
translation.ko: 그래, 뭐라고 부르든 그 사람은 조만간 자기 손으로 애들을 죽일 거 같아

translation.en: One day she'll kill one of her children.
translation.ko: 그 사람은 조만간 자기 손으로 애들을 죽일 거 같아

translation.en: When I passed her just now,
she was giving me the stink eye, like I stole her husband.
translation.ko: 내가 자기 남편이라도 훔친 듯 노려보더라고

translation.en: -[laughs] -No wonder the man divorced her.
Who wants to wake up to such an angry face every day?
translation.ko: 누가 매일 아침 화난 얼굴을 보고 싶겠어?

translation.en: One day she'll kill one of her children.
translation.ko: 언젠가 자기 손으로 애들을 죽이고 말 거야

translation.en: Is there any food?
Umar. That is it, see me later in my office.
translation.ko: 우마, 요점은 그거야 이따가 내 사무실로 와

translation.en: -Tolani. -Yes, sir?
See me in my office.
Mr. Salako has requested that you be transferred downstairs, to work with him.
translation.ko: 살라코 씨가 자기 부서로 톨라니를 옮겨달라고 요청했어

translation.en: Why, sir?
He wants someone from within the bank to replace his secretary.
translation.ko: 새 비서를 은행 직원 중에서 뽑고 싶다더군

translation.en: I've told him that you'll be available from tomorrow.
I want you to clean out your desk today and report to him downstairs.
translation.ko: 오늘 자리 정리하고 아래층에 가 보도록

translation.en: But I have plenty of letters to type, sir.
translation.ko: 하지만 작성해야 할 편지가 아직 많은데요

translation.en: What letters?
Bad debts. There's so many of them and…
Sir, please, I like it here in loans.
Mr. Salako has requested that you be transferred.
translation.ko: 살라코 씨가 자네의 부서 이동을 요청했어

translation.en: Yes.
Come in.
Alhaji Umar said I should report to you sir.
translation.ko: 알하지 우마 씨가 여기로 보고하라고 하셨습니다

translation.en: Hm, yes, um, Miss Ajao.
I had a meeting with him regarding, uh…
my former secretary. What's her name?
translation.ko: 내 전 비서 일에 관해서 이름이 뭐였더라?

translation.en: What's her name again?
-Rose Adamson, sir. -Mm-hmm!
I think you are the suitable person for that… office.
translation.ko: 자네가 잘 맞을 거 같아 어… 이 사무실에

translation.en: Because whenever I see you, you always appear neat. Very neat.
translation.ko: 볼 때마다 깔끔한 차림이더군 매우 깔끔해

translation.en: Eh. And you're a Yoruba girl?
-Yes sir. -Okay.
Please, you are from where?
Makoku, sir.
Makoku. Makoku interior I guess.
We're not interior people. We're Egba, sir.
Did you say Egba?
Yes, sir.
Okay. What does your father do?
My father was a drummer sir.
Was a drummer? Oh.
He's passed on. What a pity. May God grant him heavenly rest.
Thank you, sir.
God grant him heavenly rest. And your mother?
My mother makes adire. She's a cloth dyer sir.
Hm. I see. I see. Whatever, they raised you well.
translation.ko: 그렇군, 어찌 됐든 자네를 잘 키우셨어

translation.en: You have manners.
Anyway, what about your diction?
Diction, English. My diction, sir?
Your diction! Ah, don't you understand English?
How do you… do you speak and write?
My diction is fine, sir.
Uh, what… whatever, let's give it to Rose. Hm.
Her English grammar, diction
were excellent. Very excellent.
Anyway, you will go to her desk now, clean the desk for me.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 로즈 자리로 가 자리 정리 좀 해 주고

translation.en: Because the last time I tried to check the desk,
the whole place looked horrible.
Like, uh, she packed a lot of juju there.
-Juju? -Yes, juju. Hmm.
Like you don't know what juju is.
-Go and clean the place. -[phone ringing]
Hello.
Hello, sir.
Yes, sir. Yes, sir.
You don't know my job, you don't know what my job entails.
translation.ko: 넌 내 일이 뭔지 몰라 무슨 일을 하는지 모른다고

translation.en: You don't know anything.
There's nothing that entails anything in that… in that bank.
translation.ko: 그 은행에서 의미 있는 일은 하나도 없어

translation.en: All the work I was doing for Alhaji Umar last week, he didn't even know.
translation.ko: 지난주에 우마가 시킨 일도 하나도 모르고 있더라고

translation.en: What could it possibly entail?
You say hello to a customer, the customer says hello to you. Finish!
No. Tolani, no.
Look, when a customer comes in or they call on the phone,
the way you interact with them
should make them relaxed and very comfortable.
I did all this there.
I don't want to.
So why not tell him you didn't want the job?
How?
This man knows what he's doing.
translation.ko: 그 사람은 다 알고 하는 거야

translation.en: He's doing it because he knows we live together.
translation.ko: 알면서 그러는 거라고 우리가 같이 사는 거 아니까

translation.en: He wants me to come and beg him.
Over my dead body. I'll never go beg him.
translation.ko: 절대 그러지 않을 거야 절대 빌지 않을 거라고

translation.en: Is he that scared of juju?
That man? He's worse than an illiterate.
And that smell in his office, what is it?
translation.ko: 그 사무실에서 나는 냄새는 대체 뭐야?

translation.en: He farts. He farts a lot.
You'll get used to it.
And you'll get used to it when he starts touching you.
God forbid.
Johnny, Johnny.
Ah, Rambling Rose! Don't contaminate this contraband.
translation.ko: 수다쟁이 로즈! 이 밀수품을 더럽히지 마

translation.en: You never ask after me.
-Do you ask? -This is my only wife in Lagos.
translation.ko: - 내 소식 궁금해? - 내 유일한 라고스의 부인

translation.en: So tell me, where are you guys rambling to today?
We want to buy shoes, but your shoes are always too expensive…
translation.ko: 신발 사려고 했는데 네 신발은 너무 비싸니까, 뭐

translation.en: Is that so!
So that's why you never patronize me. No problem.
translation.ko: 그래서 내 물건은 안 샀던 거구나, 괜찮아

translation.en: This is my friend, I'm taking him to a boutique.
translation.ko: 이쪽은 내 친구인데 저쪽 가게로 데려가려고

translation.en: You know he doesn't shop around here. We need to upgrade.
translation.ko: 여기 물건은 안 사거든 좀 더 고급품이 필요해

translation.en: Hello.
Eh, O to the C! OC Money!
You see these two, they're my favorite customers in Lagos.
translation.ko: 이 둘은 내 라고스 최고의 손님들이야

translation.en: Now see this one, he's an original fly guy!
He just came back from United States.
-Of America? -Is there another one?
Really? Okay then.
-This one is your size. -Buy these for me.
translation.ko: - 이게 너한테 맞겠다 - 와서 이것 좀 사 줘

translation.en: -You mean this? -Hm.
Baby, see. Austerity measures.
Ah, Johnny, you haven't changed, you're still stingy,
Please leave my shoes.
-How much is it? -Five naira, that seven naira.
-How much? -I'll pay two naira fifty kobo.
Seven naira.
I'm paying two naira, 50 kobo.
-Did you tell her five? -It's seven.
It's seven naira.
-Five naira. -Five for the two of them.
No. Okay, you pay six naira.
-We don't have that. Two naira, 50 kobo. -No.
-Hey Johnny! -Yes?
No time, you know. I'll pay.
translation.ko: 시간 없는 거 알잖아 그냥 내가 낼게

translation.en: -OC Money! -It's all good.
Okay! Put it in a bag.
Thank you. My name is Rose.
My name is OC. But my friends call me OC Money.
translation.ko: 난 OC인데 친구들은 OC 머니라고 불러

translation.en: What are you doing with this person, he doesn't like spending money.
translation.ko: 왜 이런 사람이랑 어울려? 얘는 돈 쓰기 싫어하는데

translation.en: [laughs] He's a cool guy, you know, very cool guy.
Can I come visit you?
Sure.
All right, you should give me your address.
-My address? -Yes.
-So, we'll see. -Yeah.
-Take care. -Yeah.
He's nice.
-Who? -Uh-uh.
-OC now. -You don't know him, let's go.
You?
Come in.
Please make yourself comfortable.
Here we are.
So what can I offer you?
Beer.
What is it?
Let me get you some wine instead.
No, I only drink beer.
It's not ladylike.
Wine is better, trust me.
translation.ko: 와인이 더 나아, 내 말 믿어

translation.en: I'll drink whatever you give me.
Wine it is. I'll be right back.
Ah, you should've seen OC's house, there's no gadget he doesn't have.
translation.ko: OC 집을 봐야 했어 온갖 전자 기기가 다 있다니까

translation.en: And he's as generous as my father.
Can you imagine?
When I was there, what's his name… Johnny came by.
translation.ko: 거기 있을 때… 누구더라? 조니가 왔어

translation.en: He started asking me questions when OC went to the kitchen.
translation.ko: OC가 주방에 들어가니까 나한테 질문을 퍼붓더라

translation.en: -Okay, so feel free okay? -Okay.
Rose, what is going on between you and him?
How is it your business?
I just ignored him. Nonsense.
He claims he is into import and export
and yet he never bought me even a drink when we were dating.
translation.ko: 사귈 때 술 한잔 사 준 적이 없어

translation.en: But now he wants to monitor me, asking silly questions. Please.
translation.ko: 그런데 이제 와서 감시하고 바보 같은 질문을 하다니

translation.en: OC is his friend.
And so? Hasn't it been long enough since we dated?
He doesn't own me, I can do anything I want.
translation.ko: 내가 조니 것도 아니니까 마음대로 해도 되지

translation.en: He probably has many girlfriends. You know how he is.
translation.ko: 여자 친구가 얼마나 많았는데 조니가 어떤 애인지 알잖아

translation.en: Please, let me drink my wine.
OC said I should stop drinking beer.
Uh. Please, uh, get me that file.
translation.ko: 음, 그 서류 좀 가져다 줘

translation.en: Okay, sir.
Here it is, sir.
Thank you.
OC it was a struggle coming here today.
I really struggled.
So if you want to see me again,
you'll have to start giving me taxi money.
And I mean the proper taxis, not those rickety ones.
translation.ko: 그 허름한 택시 말고 제대로 된 걸로

translation.en: That's no problem, you know.
Thank you. Because I have no money left.
I don't even have money for rent.
That's no problem too, I'll take care of that.
Thank you.
You know, while you're at it, don't you think you need new shoes?
translation.ko: 어차피 쓰는 돈인데 새 신발 필요하지 않아?

translation.en: Uh-uh. Why?
Your shoe is old.
From trekking now.
Your friend was right, you know? You should start wearing better shoes.
translation.ko: 네 친구 말이 옳았어 더 좋은 신발을 신는 게 좋겠어

translation.en: Who has time to wear high heels everywhere?
I'm only offering.
If you want to buy, no problem. Buy, I won't say no. As long as it's free.
translation.ko: 네가 사고 싶다면 사 공짜라면 거절 안 해

translation.en: Not exactly.
How?
You will have to do something for me.
Your shoes are nice.
Really? You can have any you want.
They're not my size.
Just tired. Today I did a lot of shopping.
translation.ko: 그냥 좀 피곤해 오늘 쇼핑을 많이 했거든

translation.en: I shopped.
When are you going to start looking for another job?
Uh-uh. Why?
I'm just saying, you don't want to get used to being at home for too long.
translation.ko: 집에 있는 데 너무 익숙해지면 안 되잖아

translation.en: Ah, I'm not… I'm not looking for a job. I don't want to work again.
translation.ko: 난… 난 일자리 안 찾아 다시 일하고 싶지 않아

translation.en: OC said I shouldn't work, that he'll take care of me.
translation.ko: OC가 일하지 말래 자기가 보살펴 준다고

translation.en: He even asked me to move in with him.
What?
But I told him I wasn't ready.
translation.ko: 하지만 아직 준비가 안 됐다고 말했어

translation.en: He said I'm the kind of woman he would like to marry.
-When? -Today.
After how many days of knowing you?
Let me tell you something. You are not a child!
You cannot move into a house with a man you barely know. Or marry him.
translation.ko: 잘 알지도 못하는 남자 집에 들어가거나 결혼하면 안 돼

translation.en: Anybody who does that kind of thing is clearly asking for trouble.
translation.ko: 그런 일은 결국 문제밖에 안 돼

translation.en: No quarrel, is it your problem?
Is it not my trouble?
It's your problem.
Silly girl.
Why are you so upset about it?
You know what baffles me the most about this whole thing?
translation.ko: 여기서 제일 이해가 안 되는 점은

translation.en: It's that it's been just three weeks since they started dating.
translation.ko: 여기서 제일 이해가 안 되는 점은 만난 지 겨우 3주밖에 안 됐는데 벌써 결혼 얘기를 한다는 거야

translation.en: He's already talking about marriage.
Look, Tolani, why don't you stop focusing on those people's business?
translation.ko: 톨라니, 다른 사람 문제에 너무 집착하지 마

translation.en: Okay. She doesn't work, she doesn't do anything.
translation.ko: 그래, 걔는 일도 안 해 아무것도 안 한다고

translation.en: And she's always eating my food.
Did she just start eating your food today?
translation.ko: 네 음식 먹은 게 오늘 처음이야?

translation.en: She didn't just start eating my food today,
but what if she moves out and is no longer paying the rent?
translation.ko: 하지만 집에서 나가고 집세를 안 내겠다고 하면

translation.en: What would I do? Where would I go?
Okay. Whenever I ask her where he lives,
translation.ko: 그리고 그 남자가 어디에 사냐고 물어보면

translation.en: she says it's in Ikeja, it's in Along, or something else.
She has never once told me where he lives.
translation.ko: 어디 사는지 한 번도 제대로 안 말해 줬어

translation.en: She's never told me! What is Rose hiding?
translation.ko: 안 말해 줬다고! 대체 뭘 숨기는 걸까?

translation.en: -What exactly is she hiding? -Why don't you just ask her?
translation.ko: - 뭘 숨기는 걸까? - 그냥 물어보지 그래?

translation.en: I should ask her? Have you not heard anything I've been saying?
translation.ko: 물어보라고? 지금까지 내가 한 말 못 들었어?

translation.en: All this, I'm tired.
I'm tired of all this stress.
That reminds me, the business you wanted to do,
translation.ko: 그러고 보니 당신이 하고 싶다던 사업 말이야

translation.en: is your uncle giving you money for it?
No.
I don't want him in my business at all.
Why?
When I establish this business, starts going well, bringing in money,
translation.ko: 이 사업을 시작해서 잘되고 돈이 들어오기 시작하면

translation.en: it'll mean I'm set and can be on my own.
Ah, that's good but, where will you get money?
translation.ko: 그건 좋지만 돈은 어디서 구할 건데?

translation.en: What do you think I've been running around for?
But, it would be too late.
That would take too long.
I suggest I give you what little I have left of my savings,
so you can add it to the money you have. Eh?
And then you can start from there.
Tolani, I didn't come here to beg for money.
translation.ko: 톨라니 나 돈 빌리러 온 거 아니야

translation.en: I know, Sanwo, I know you didn't come here to beg for money,
translation.ko: 알아, 돈 빌리러 온 거 아니겠지만

translation.en: but it'll take too long.
Too long before you have enough .

What's the problem?
Do you want me to call the hostess?
Burst bags.
She was a bad investment.
-Shh! -She was someone's daugh--
Don't even! Don't. Don't try it.
If you're looking for someone to blame, blame yourself!
You put too much doubt in her mind.
translation.ko: 걔 머리 속에 의심을 너무 많이 심었잖아

translation.en: Damn! You caused everything you know!
Hey! Shh. Shut up! Shut up.
Get out of this place by daybreak.
If I come back and meet you here, you're dead meat. Dead meat!
translation.ko: 내일 왔을 때 여기 있으면 죽은 목숨인 줄 알아!

translation.en: Rose. [sobs]
And I warned you, Rose.
I warned you.
It took death for you to open up, Tolani.
Eh? All by yourself.
Facing all these difficulties.
You should've come home. Hmm?
Are you scared of your home? Do you have another mother?
translation.ko: 네 집이 무서워? 엄마가 둘이라도 돼?

translation.en: [sniffles] Mommy…
You've taught me, and you made sure I can stand on my own.
translation.ko: 날 단련시키고 혼자 설 수 있도록 도왔잖아요

translation.en: Not in this kind of situation. Not when you're suffering, not when you're hungry.
translation.ko: 이런 상황에서는 아니지 고통받고 배고플 때는 아니야

translation.en: Look, right now, I'll boil some herbs for you.
translation.ko: 자, 지금 약초 좀 끓여 올게

translation.en: For you bathe with and drink. Yes.
-Herbs? -Yes, herbs.
Can you see all that hollowness in your neck? It will fill up.
translation.ko: 목 안의 빈 곳을 채워 줄 거야

translation.en: Let me quickly go make it. Go in and change.
translation.ko: 가서 빨리 만들게 들어가서 옷 갈아입어

translation.en: I hear you.
May I never be unfortunate.
-Good morning, ma. -My dear.
Happy selling.
May you make sales.
-You too. -Thanks!
-Good morning, ma. -Good morning.
Tolani!
-Tolani. -Ma?
You have a visitor.
Who is it?
Sanwo.
How'd you know I was here?
translation.ko: 나 여기 있는 거 어떻게 알았어?

translation.en: I'm going to the market.
When I get back, we'll finish our talk. Yes, ma.
-Bye, ma. -Bye, ma.
Bye, my dear.
Have a seat.
You're surprised to see me, right?
Will you drink some water?
I will.
-Here. -Thank you.
Help me give thanks.
For what?
I found a job.
Where?
Consultancy firm.
What would you be doing there?
I'm in the accounting department.
At least you'll be able to move out.
Tolani, what happened?
I called your office, Godwin said Salako sacked you for misconduct.
translation.ko: 사무실에 전화했더니 살라코가 공권 남용으로 해고했다던데

translation.en: When I pressed him further,
he said Mrs. Archibong queried Salako and suspended him.
translation.ko: 아치봉 부인이 살라코에게 의문을 제기하고 정직시켰대

translation.en: That suspension is how he'll lose his job.
May God let her read what I wrote in my report.
She'll see that Rose and I were not crazy.
translation.ko: 로즈와 내가 미치지 않았다는 걸 알게 될 거야

translation.en: He doesn't know who he's dealing with. He doesn't know your spirit.
translation.ko: 살라코가 상대를 잘못 골랐네 네가 얼마나 고집스러운데

translation.en: What are you going to do now?
I don't know yet. I don't know.
This is the money you loaned me.
Take it.
And I'll give you more before the end of the month.
For the suffering you went through.
This is enough.
You tried.
It's not up to you to decide.
Thank you.
[Tolani] You did everything you could to try and drive me away.
translation.ko: 그 후에 갖은 노력을 다해 나를 꼬셨잖아

translation.en: -It's not like that. -It's not like that? How is it then?
Can you not remember all the rubbish you did?
translation.ko: 쓰레기 짓을 너무 많이 해서 기억 못 하나?

translation.en: -You're the one who did rubbish. -Me, doing rubbish? Stop lying.
translation.ko: - 쓰레기 짓은 네가 했지 - 내가? 거짓말하지 마

translation.en: -Tolani. -Mm?
You know only rich people get married before they're 40.
I'm not important? Money is more important than me.
translation.ko: 난 안 중요해? 돈이 나보다 더 중요해?

translation.en: Don't say that.
After all the trouble you caused me. You think I'll let you go that easily?
translation.ko: 당신 때문에 얼마나 힘들었는데 그렇게 쉽게 놔 줄 거 같아?

translation.en: That reminds me. I forgot to ask you, where's Rose?
translation.ko: 그러고 보니 깜빡했네 로즈는 어디 있어?

translation.en: Good afternoon.
Rose.
Mama Chidi said she wasn't home.
Rose has gone home.
That's good. We all need rest.
That reminds me, Sanwo, please,
help me give my landlord this one and give Violet this one.
translation.ko: 우리 집주인한테 이걸 주고 바이올렛 언니한테 이걸 줘

translation.en: And you know my furniture? I want you to send it to me when you get to Lagos.
translation.ko: 라고스에 도착하면 내 가구들 좀 보내 주고

translation.en: Or maybe you should help me sell them and send the money.
Tolani. Say it one at a time.
All right, don't be upset. I'll write it all down.
translation.ko: 알았어, 화내지 마 다 적어 놨어

translation.en: But can I trust you to follow through?
-I've told you before, I'm not a bastard. -Alright, I've hear you. Don't be angry.
translation.ko: - 나 나쁜 놈 아니랬잖아 - 그래, 알겠어, 화내지 마

translation.en: -Sorry. -[driver] No worries, sir.
